_sText:
Extraxt all files to the Counter-Strike Source/cstrike/maps folder.

=========================================
* LEVEL INFORMATION *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
TITLE                   : cs_logistic_assault_rc2
FILENAME                : cs_logistic_assault_rc2.bsp
AUTHOR                  : Bluestrike McQueen
DATE                    : 27 june 2005 
GAME                    : half-Life 2 COunter-Strike Source.
EMAIL ADDRESS           : Bluestrike@bluestrike.be
HOMEPAGE URL            : http://www.bluestrike.be
 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* LEVEL DESCRIPTION *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Another remake of cs_assault but I took a wider approach.
Setting is a european industrial area, Terrorists drove into a industial
building when followed by the police and took hostages,
A Counter Terrorism team is send to handle the situation.
 
NEW TEXTURES            : a few
NEW MODELS		: none

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* CONSTRUCTION *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
MAP BASE                : Size reference of cs_assault
MAP VERSION		: build 40 (rc2 public release)
PREFABS USED            : none
EDITOR(S) USED          : Hammer 4,0 and Paint Shop Pro 
OTHER UTILITIES USED    : none 
KNOWN BUGS              : none.
 
COMPILE MACHINE         : P4 3,6MHz, 1024 DDR2 RAM, Winxp
 
compile time		: 1 hour 15 minutes
time spend on building 	: 3-4 weeks after work

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* OTHER LEVELS BY THE AUTHOR *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Too many to name but here is a pick:

cs_beirut (Counter-strike)
de_kilo (Counter-strike)

Nickrock (Farcry singleplay)
  
de_kilo II (Counter-strike Source)
cs_beirut II (Counter-Strike Source)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* SPECIAL INSTRUCTIONS / ADDITIONAL INFORMATION *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* CREDITS *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Cryptr for the orriginal map cs_assault
CocoNuT for the improved NAV file. (http://coconut.de.tc)
Valve for their awesome game and support
Thanks to all the tutorial makers out there.
Thanks to the people who gave valuable feedback.



====================================
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
You MUST NOT distribute this level UNLESS you INCLUDE THIS FILE WITH
NO MODIFICATIONS!!!. If you don't co-operate, then DON'T DISTRIBUTE
IT IN ANY FORM!!.

You can do everything you like as long as this unchanged txt file wil be includded!
ofcourse letting me know will be apreciated. 

Bluestrike, Belgium.
